'''''Tolkien in aller Welt: Eine Ausstellung der Inklings-Gesellschaft anläßlich des 100''''' (German: '''Tolkien around the world: An exhibition by the Inklings Society on the occasion of the 100th anniversary''') is an exhibition catalogue from Öffentliche Bibliothek der Stadt [[Wikipedia:Aachen|Aachen]]. 

The catalogue includes a reproduction (p. 12) of a letter from [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]] to the [[Tolkien Society of America]].<ref>[http://www.tolkienbooks.net/php/details.php?reference=55290 Tolkien in aller Welt. 1992] at [http://www.tolkienbooks.net Tolkienbooks.net] (accessed 27 October 2011)</ref>
